article.headline: Amazon sets a date for Prime Day India, but the U.S. has yet to be determined
article.body: Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, +3.01% said early Tuesday that Prime Day in India is set for August 6 and 7, though the e-commerce giant has yet to announce the dates for Prime Day in the U.S. Last year, Prime Day U.S. took place July 15 and 16. Prime Day India will include a two-week period before the official launch in which customers can shop from local small businesses. Amazon stock has rallied, closing Monday up 8%, though pulling back 1.2% in early Tuesday trading. The stock is up more than 70% for the year to date while the S&P 500 index SPX, +0.87% has gained 1.1% for the period.
